title: Remembering The '69 World Series And The Miracle Mets
teaser: The Kansas City Royals are the surprise team in the World Series, which reminded NPR's Brian Naylor of the series he attended 45 years ago, when the Miracle New York Mets upset the favored Baltimore Orioles.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
